directions: Place potatoes into a large pot and cover with salted water; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until tender, about 15 minutes. Drain.
Mix feta cheese, butter, milk, capers, garlic, salt, and pepper into the potatoes. Mash with a potato masher or electric mixer to desired consistency.
ingredients: 2 pounds Yukon Gold potatoes, peeled and cubed
1/2 (4 ounce) package crumbled tomato and basil feta cheese (such as Athenos®)
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Tangy Feta Mashed Potatoes
